eVisit is transforming the way healthcare providers deliver care to their patients. It is patient engagement software that enables providers to increase patient flow and revenue, while providing convenience to their patients with online treatment.
Clean Router provides the Ultimate Parental Controls.  It allows parents to easily manage all devices in your home and stop explicit content.

Now in its fifth year, the Technology Entrepreneurship & Management (TEM) program at Arizona State University’s Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering has quickly become one of the nation’s largest and fastest growing entrepreneurship degree programs. TEM offers the nation’s only undergraduate engineering college-based entrepreneurship degree.As an Advisory Board Member I'm called on to provide input, on various TEM activities, programs and classes, both current and proposed. I also participate in annual meetings alongside executives from organizations such as Google, Amazon, Intel, Boing and Starbucks.

CampusLogic delivers SaaS solutions for colleges and universities that decrease administrative costs and transform the student experience.  As VP of Marketing I was brought on as the first marketing hire to architect the marketing arm of the organization. Working cross-functionally, I led the rebranding and positioning of the company, developed the strategic marketing plan, hired a team of 7 to support in the execution of that marketing plan and led demand/lead generation efforts to contribute $12.6 million in qualified deal flow into the sales pipeline in a period of 4-months.•	Increased weekly web traffic, from baseline average, by 918% in 5-months•	Developed and iterated website visitor retargeting strategy that averaged a 0.75% click through rate (1,071% higher than industry average of .07%)•	Developed and oversaw content marketing strategy to position company as thought leaders among target customers in higher education•	Developed content distribution strategy which led to increased social reach of 812% over a 3-month period

recommendations: January 8, 2017, Teresa reported directly to Bret

Leading a tech start-up to success is an incredible challenge, but one that Bret has continually proved he's capable of. I had the opportunity to work closely with Bret as one of the first hires at eVisit. During only our first year and a half, eVisit became an AZ innovation challenge winner, a top contender in the telemedicine software space, and grew to a 25+ employee team under Bret's leadership. Bret not only has the business acumen and vision to take eVisit to the top, he's an incredibly positive, driven, and caring leader, able to connect with and inspire his team members.

Bret is clearly one of the most talented digital marketers in Phoenix. He created clear vision and strategy in building our marketing, content and web tactics for CampusLogic. His ability to define an approach to customer acquisition, develop go-to-market strategies and implement procedures to drive those strategies is unparalleled. Bret’s work ethic and natural marketing savvy will allow him to be successful in whatever he pursues.

It is rare that I can whole-heartedly endorse a colleague. I'm thrilled to be able to do so for Teresa, without reservation. Teresa is one of those rare individuals who is internally motivated to bring their "A" game each and every day. Her attention to detail, coupled with motivation to be the best she can possibly be, made her indispensable to myself and eVisit as a whole. As my very first hire at eVisit, Teresa took the initiative to create a world-class, predictable marketing system and executed flawlessly on her initiatives. A few of the rare traits that make Teresa such an incredibly valuable team member, include: (1) Her ability to proactively create solutions to avoid future roadblocks; (2) Her ability to manage KPIs and analyze those indicators to consistently improve upon them; (3) Her organizational skills and attention to detail allow her to be 5x+ more efficient than the average contributor.In short, Teresa is a star player who I would hire again without thinking twice. She will excel at whatever she puts her mind to. Because of these qualities, she can write her own ticket. If you should find yourself fortunate enough to have her considering you as an employer, do whatever you can to bring her onto your team - it will be well worth the investment!

summary: As a lean startup entrepreneur and digital marketer I’m passionate about building sustainable systems that allow early stage ventures to grow at scale. I am an analytics-focused and metrics-driven growth hacker who focuses on growth through inbound marketing strategies. My agile approach to customer acquisition, experience developing go-to-market strategies and my ability to implement the tactics to drive those strategies has allowed me to demonstrate a significant ROI for the organizations with which I have associated.I have worked with B2B SaaS organizations in Health Tech, Ed Tech and Ad Tech as well as B2C eCommerce in apparel and gift brands, developing strategies and teams to drive growth through content marketing, search engine optimization (SEO), search engine marketing (SEM), social media marketing, email marketing and marketing automation.Currently I spend my time growing eVisit, the patient engagement software platform for small-to-medium sized healthcare provider practices. It allows providers to increase revenue and efficiency within their existing patient population.
name: Bret Larsen
title: CEO at eVisit
